thread.title: BRIEF-First Mid-Illinois Bancshares Says On April 13, Co Entered Into Fifth Amended And Restated Credit Agreement With Northern Trust Co

title: BRIEF-First Mid-Illinois Bancshares Says On April 13, Co Entered Into Fifth Amended And Restated Credit Agreement With Northern Trust Co

organizations.name: restated credit agreement with northern trust co market news
restated credit agreement with northern trust co reuters

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - First Mid-Illinois Bancshares Inc :
* FIRST MID-ILLINOIS BANCSHARES SAYS ON APRIL 13, CO ENTERED INTO FIFTH AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT WITH NORTHERN TRUST COMPANY - SEC FILING
* UNDER TERMS, EXTENDED MATURITY DATE OF CO'S $10 MILLION REVOLVING LOAN FROM APRIL 13, 2018 TO APRIL 12, 2019 Source text: ( bit.ly/2quPPXv ) Further company coverage:
